由 Dimension 和 AP Moller Holding 支持的 4000 万美元融资，用于扩大不断增长的生命科学实验室自动化产品一家为生命科学实验室提供支持的领先自动化公司已筹集 4000 万美元，以加速其在美国、英国和欧洲、中东和非洲地区的快速增长和行业影响力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231003/2440m-fundraise-backed-by-Dimension-and-AP-Moller-Holding-to-expand-grinding-life-science-lab-automation-offering。 ASPX https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231003/2440m-fundraise-backed-by-Dimension-and-AP-Moller-Holding-to-expand-grinding-life-science-lab-automation-offering。 aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d906ba3f-2d31-4935-8f26-3b82ffab1ceb Tue, 03 Oct 2023 10:37:00 -0400 $40m fundraise backed by Dimension and A.P. 打破慢性背痛的循环：新研究揭示了改变疼痛信念的力量研究人员检查了疼痛处理疗法是否可以缓解疼痛并有助于改善康复过程，这种疗法涉及将疼痛重新归因于大脑或心灵的过程，而不是表明组织损伤或损伤。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231003/Breaking-the-cycle-of-chronic-back-pain-new-study-reveals-the-power-of-shifting-pain-beliefs.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231003/Breaking-the-cycle-of-chronic-back-pain-new-study-reveals-the-power-of-shifting-pain-beliefs.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=28e2a68e-ee87-45b3-b4d2-da2f515c8332 Tue, 03 Oct 2023 07:29:00 -0400 Breaking the cycle of chronic back pain: new study reveals the power of shifting pain beliefs
